landing.scroll: Scroll down to start the interactive tour

steps.title: Desoutter Ecosystem Overview
steps.description:
Desoutter ecosystem provides, thanks to interconnected software platforms, an integrated product, digital and human solution to boost your productivity, boost your uptime and boost your flexibility while reducing quality costs.

The ecosystem value proposition covers an array of key processes in your manufacturing environment, from tightening and drilling applications to station level process control and line management to data analytics to challenge further your production efficiency.

Desoutter ecosystem is scalable, customizable, designed for intuitive asset integration. This future proof software and hardware ecosystem is open to be integrated within your production environment through industry standards as well as customer specific communication protocols
coreBenefits: Global offer with interconnected platforms from applications up to data analytics with prescriptions
Fully scalable and flexible: select the platforms or individual solutions whenever required by the evolution of your production environment
Easy integration : intuitive asset management with industry standard and customer specific communication protocols

steps.title: Feature management
steps.description:
Desoutter ecosystem delivers unrivalled flexibility thanks to a unique Feature Management solution.

Feature Management powers the full scalability of the Desoutter ecosystem by activating only the features required for every workstation. The activation of new features, or reallocation of an existing station from one to another, is made in a very easy way in order to adapt quickly workstations to changing production requirements.
Line rebalancing has never been made so quickly and in such an easy way!

Thanks to Desoutter’s Feature Management you will have:

  • Budget control by buying only what you need,
  • Flexibility to adjust your usage of features in the future to match the evolution of your needs,
  • Ease of usage, testing and implementation.
coreBenefits: Only use the features you need
Fully scalable solution: adjust your features activations and allocations to meet your production requirements as they evolve over time
Unrivalled flexibility thanks to the easiness and speed of line rebalancing

steps.title: Connected assets
steps.description:
Flexibility and traceability are key factors for a successful Industry 4.0 transformation.

Connected assets ensure an easy integration within the assembly process and guarantee traceability and integrity of all the data.
coreBenefits: Multi assets solution with lowest footprint on the line
Flexible and scalable platform
Full traceability
Fast and easy line rebalancing
Easy integration with industry standard and customer specific communication protocols

steps.title: Platform integration
steps.description:
Platorm integration is becoming critical due to products variants and line flexibility but also because of the increasing advances in automation technology, and the associated need to simplify processes for easier management.

A platform integration streamlines your processes, reduce costs, improves quality and ensures efficiency overall.
coreBenefits: Enhanced flexibility, quality and productivity
Full error proofing solutions
Light and full automation solutions
Customization based on tested and proven designs

steps.title: Process control
steps.description:
Critical to guarantee the overall quality of the end product through the assembly journey and record all process information providing a complete history of traceability, process control also provides production process optimization and agility to make changes and adjustments deployed quickly and without additional cost.

Thanks to an integrated operator guidance, complex processes are broken down to individual steps which operators follow in order to reduce risks of quality defects and their associated costs which supports your overall quality and efficiency goals.
coreBenefits: Flexibility over process requirements to optimize productivity and manage line rebalancing
Full error proofing protection of your product assembly with complete traceability of every element involved in the process
Out of the box integration & compatibility with a wide variety of industrial equipment and systems
Scalability from a single stand-alone station to complete assembly lines and more
Maximize your return on investment via full customer ownership of the solution and avoid expensive supplier system modification costs

steps.title: Data driven solution
steps.description:
Strategic and high impact decisions have to be based on facts and data. The sooner the data is available, the quicker will you be able to react and make decisions.

Desoutter’s data driven solution provides you with real-time information as events are occurring on the line.

Additionally, Desoutter’s applications and process expertise have been integrated in the data analytics to support you in understanding the data and the root causes of unwanted events.

Boost your productivity, boost your uptime, reduce your quality costs and improve your overall process efficiency with Desoutter’s data driven solution.
coreBenefits: Assets insights updated in real-time to maximize your productivity and uptime
Processes insights updated in real-time to maximize your productivity and quality
Live alerts of production critical events to maximize your productivity and uptime
Data analytics for continuous process efficiency gains

outro.title: Desoutter is a global company with
outro.subtitle: strong local project management and service expertise

steps.title: Desoutter Service
steps.description:
Stay connected with your Desoutter expert team to achieve the full potential of your equipment.

By working with Desoutter Service you will secure and expand the value of Desoutter Ecosystem in your environment.

It is the key step to implement the Desoutter Data Driven Solutions recommended actions to close the loop for continuous efficiency gains from data analytics.

steps.title: Project Management
steps.description:
One of your keys to success is the support Desoutter’s project managers bring thanks to their expertise on assembly solutions and to excellence in project management.

Desoutter customizes tools and solutions according to your exact application and integrates them efficiently in your production environment, based on tested and proven designs in order to secure quality and leadtime.

chapters.title: 1. Connected assets
chapters.description: Connected assets ensure an easy integration within the assembly process and guarantee traceability and integrity of all the data.
chapters.infotip: Use our proactive maintenance solutions to avoid breakdowns and keep high quality in your assembly.

items.label: EABC & EPBC
items.description:
Pistol and angle head transducerized ranges.
Highly ergonomic and accurate battery tool for quality critical and safety critical applications.

items.label: EABS
items.description:
The ONE hand nutrunners.
Ergonomically designed for one-hand operations, this 30 cm long tool with an extremely compact angle head eliminates space constraints.

items.label: BLRTC
items.description:
Battery electric pulse tool.
With his unique technology BLRTC enables reaction free tightening. This means that the worker no longer feels any reaction force when the final torque is reached, and no torque support is required.

items.label: ELC-W
items.description:
Clutch tool range.
ELC-W tools offer an entry-level solution for Industry 4.0 compatible assembly.
This connected clutch tool range is a simple and efficient solution for secondary screw joints in your process.

items.label: QSHIELD
items.description:
Digital Wrench for torque & angle measurement.
The digital wrench is a unique, flexible device for production and rework stations which provides a high accuracy solution for both torque and angle-controlled joints tightening as well as residual torque checks.

items.label: EDU
items.description:
Electric Drilling Unit.
The smart ready EDU can cover a variety of applications using the same tool thanks to its modular design. Electrification offers unique benefits in terms of process and maintenance optimization compared to the traditional air powered solutions.

chapters.title: 2. Platform integration
chapters.description: Platform integration is becoming critical due to products variants and line flexibility but also because of the increasing advances in automation technology, and the associated need to simplify processes for easier management.
chapters.infotip: With dedicated service solutions to platform integration portfolio, Desoutter’s expert team will enable you to maximize your asset efficiency.

items.label: CONNECT
items.description:
Smart hub concentrates assets data and guarantees data integrity.
The CONNECT is a pioneer taking assets management on your production line to a new level.
Whether it’s physically integrated close to the maintenance department for instance or in your server room the CONNECT will deploy our feature management over multiple Tightening Units, through one single point of contact to your network. Tightening Units are defined to fulfill most standard requirements and for more value adding stations you have the flexibility to activate additional features.

items.label: Virtual cable
items.description:
Station level tracking solution.
Virtual Cable is a solution that enables total traceability and control over tools locations and applications. Virtual Cable ensures that the correct wireless tool can only be used for its pre-determined tasks in the correct working area.

items.label: Desoutter visio
items.description:
Bolt level tracking solution.
With this solution, operators will perform fastening operations in the right sequence, at the right torque, with the right tool and in the right position.

items.label: MULTI
items.description:
Mutli-spindle solution.
MULTI is the most innovative, compact and flexible multi-spindle system, with an optimized design for an easy integration physically and digitally.

items.label: RAPID
items.description:
Screw feeding system.
Rapid is our standard, complete product offering for automatic screw feeding and tightening solutions to drive productivity and reduce cycle time.

items.label: EFBC
items.description:
Light automation tightening solution.
Wireless spindle with optimized design for automation, including compliance with the highest safety standards for collaborative installations.

items.label: Customized solutions
items.description: Tailor made for your application. They are based on tested and proven design to eliminate technical risk and secure delivery lead time.

chapters.title: 3. Process control - Pivotware
chapters.description: PIVOTWARE, a process control platform, is a key driver to improve your process quality and overall production efficiency. Design your process, manage it and optimise it over time with this scalable solution which can be deployed on a single station or your complete production line.
chapters.infotip: Involve Desoutter’s local software project management team from day 1 so you get the full potential of the solution and stay connected with experts through a dedicated support portal throughout the lifetime of the solution.

items.label: Station management
items.description: Thanks to the premium configuration software (Fusion), creating new stations (Infinity) and processes is made easy. Each station can be used on your own pc equipment or on Desoutter’s dedicated hardware.

items.label: Asset management
items.description: PIVOTWARE will record the data generated as part of the process for all your production assets and enable you to allocate assets to specific stations. Traceability of which asset has been used for each process step is therefore guaranteed.

items.label: Variant management
items.description: With variant management, the right process elements are selected according to the product variant as it arrives at the station. Equipment interlocking ensures that each device is enabled only at the appropriate time and with the correct settings.

items.label: Operator guidance
items.description: A complex process is broken down into individual steps for the operator to follow and guide him through the process. Each step can display images and videos as well as instructions to follow which can drastically reduce training operators and the associated costs.

chapters.title: 4. Data driven solution - DeMeter
chapters.description: DeMeter is the Desoutter Data Driven Solution that makes data become smart. While collecting the data is getting relatively common nowadays, getting the value from that data to improve your production efficiency is the disruptive purpose of DeMeter as Desoutter has integrated its applications and process expertise in this Data Driven Solution.
chapters.infotip: As part of Data Driven Solution, you will be connected to our Desoutter expert team to get support, news and even actions implementation based on data analytics.

items.label: Dashboard
items.description: With Live interactive dashboards you can get relevant insights from the data provided by your connected assets. You can choose your prefered dashboard from a list of templates. Customization can also be done to fulfill your specific needs.

items.label: Notifications
items.description: Use the Desoutter DeMeter mobile application to provide the real-time notifications to different user profiles: operator, quality, production, engineering will only receive information that requires their attention and competence. You can select which events are relevant for each user profile to align their priorities with your efficiency goals.

items.label: Boostlab
items.description: It is already an improvement to have live insights on what is happening on the production line, enabling you to react in the most efficient way but it’s even better to understand why events are happening and how to avoid them from happening again. With Boostlab, get advanced insights from data analysts and technical prescriptions to identify what are the key areas of improvement, focusing on your prefered KPI: Uptime, Quality, Takt time which will lead to improving your overall process efficiency.

footer.history: Founded in 1914 and headquartered in France, Desoutter Industrial Tools is a global leader in electric and pneumatic assembly tools serving a wide range of assembly and manufacturing operations, including Aerospace, Automotive, Light and Heavy Vehicles, Off-Road, General Industry.
